subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Cussing EVP
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
I don't think there are any rules against that. What you got is what you
got!

I for one am not offended and would like to hear them.

Zack

On Tue, May 12, 2009 at 9:34 PM, James W. Hyslope <clockdryve@...>wrote:

>
>
> Hi guys :) I am new to EVP, but I was able to purchase a NEW sealed in
> package Panasonic RR-DR60 from eBay for $130 shipped (I included an extra
> $10 to get priority shipping WITH insurance) This DR60 has been truly
> AMAZING!! I have a question. I have 2 EVP's that have cursing words in them.
> The "F" word. One is from a female saying " I hit it.....Fu$k" and another
> Male (?) sorta mechanical (original mechanical voice without editing) that
> says "HEY....we don't give a fu$k" CAN I UPLOAD these (are very clear)
> female is lower audio, but the male is easier to hear (although his vowles
> are not as clear) Or would this be PROHIBITED. I don't want to offend
> anyone, just would like to give the true results as they are....we DO get
> some "negative" results sometimes. Please advise. Thanks. Jim H
>
> 
>

I don' hink he e a e any ules agains ha . Wha you go is wha you go !
 
I o one am no o ended and would like o hea hem.
 
Zack
On Tue, May 12, 2009 a 9:34 PM, James W. Hyslope clockd y e@...> w o e:

I don' wan o o end anyone, jus would like o gi e he ue esul s as hey a e....we DO ge some "nega i e" esul s some imes. Please ad ise. Thanks. Jim H
